metadata.Title: CVE-2011-4917 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In the Linux kernel through 3.1 there is an information disclosure issue via /proc/stat.

notes.Note: apw> kernel side this is likely fixed by the commits below, we likely either also need a local patch to change defaults or userspace work to ensure appropriate mount options: 0499680a42141d86417a8fbaa8c8db806bea1201 a2ef990ab5a6705a356d146dd773a3b359787497 They also need some chmoding.  But basically upstream says that we have what we needed for these.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
